tags: Curt Teich Postcard Archives Digital Collection
description: Business Section, La Junta, Colo. La Junta is a division point on the Santa Fe. It is a thriving little city and has a number of substantial business houses as well as quite a few banks. Here the main line of the railroad starts southward towards the great Southwest; the diverging line going northward to Colorado Springs and Denver. Altitude 4,601 feet. Population about 3,000.
